replies.body:
D.5 "Posts that discuss details regarding other Minecraft servers is not allowed. Certain sections of these posts may be obscured if the post exhibits any text that could be considered advertising."

This post isn't allowed since the title clearly has the name of another server, therefore its advertising. Lock please. (Also brush up on the rules while you're at it c';)

replies.body:
People are allowed to talk about other servers in-game because they're not going out of their way to say "hey, go on this server, here's the IP".
It's a similar concept here, if you're not advertising and if the video's Avicus related in one way or another then it's fine.
